txt.en: Bring the branches to the strange man
The strange man can be found at his cabin.\n\nYou should bring the branches to the strange man.
You hand the man the wood for which he asked.\n\n'Thou hast done what thou must. When thy task is finished, wilt thou also aid my child?’
Branches can be found along the eastern edge of Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should collect branches so the man and his family do not go cold.

You greet the man and ask for his name. He does not answer your question at first, and neither does he look you in the eye when he does at last speak.\n\n'Wouldst thou care to assist my family, traveller? The gale coming off yonder peak chills us to our very bones. A fire might stave off the chill, and could be tended with some of the wood that lies a-ground, waiting to be plucked. What sayest thou?'
A nameless man requires wood to keep his family warm among the hills of Imlad Morgul.
